nodes.text: The Model 58 was a model of holster manufactured by BlasTech Industries during the Galactic Civil War.

A compact holster built for small firearms, the Model 58 was designed to fit to the contours of the wearer's body and to mask the presence of a weapon from even the most determined surveillance scans. Model 58's came in a variety of forms, and could be worn high on the belt, under the arm, in the small of the back, or on an ankle or other extremity; however, the holster could only conceal light blaster pistols and hold-out blasters.
